title: Whole-brain imaging of mice during behavior

title_detail.value: Whole-brain imaging of mice during behavior

summary: In a new study, researchers demonstrate how functional ultrasound imaging can yield high-resolution, brain-wide activity maps of mice for specific behaviors. The non-invasive technology has promising applications for ophthalmologic, neurologic and psychiatric diseases.
